reviewText: Disappointed.  Not what I was expecting.
this is novel dvd would  of liked to have a musical section in it as well as my friends love musicals

I play the DVD in a second player before I seat my guests.
its fun to use before I play the movie in my New theater.
I wish it had additional sayings like no cell phones, quite when the movie plays.etc.
It has a trivia game while the guests and family wait for the movie to play
